wikipedia_page.main:
Marc Graeme McNulty (born 14 September 1992) is a Scottish professional footballer who plays as a striker for Scottish Premiership club Dundee United, on loan from Championship club Reading.
He began his career with Livingston, moving to England aged 21 to play for Sheffield United. Following loan spells at Portsmouth and Bradford City, in 2017 he moved to Coventry City. After a season in which he helped Coventry win promotion via the playoffs, McNulty was sold to Reading.
Reading have since loaned McNulty to Hibernian (twice), Sunderland and Dundee United. During his first loan with Hibernian, McNulty earned selection for the Scotland national team.
